sources.title: Texas Terror (1935)
sources.description: Sheriff John Higgins quits and goes into prospecting after he thinks he has killed his best friend in shooting it out with robbers. He encounters his dead buddy's sister and helps her run her ranch. Then she finds out about his past. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/texas-terror-1935/

sources.title: Texas Terror  (1935) JOHN WAYNE
sources.description:
Stars: John Wayne, Lucile Browne, LeRoy Mason
Director: Robert N. Bradbury

Sheriff John Higgins quits and goes into prospecting after he thinks he has killed his best friend in shooting it out with robbers.

sources.title: Texas Terror (1935) John Wayne - Action, Adventure, Drama
sources.description:
Sheriff John Higgins quits and goes into prospecting after he thinks he has killed his best friend in shooting it out with robbers. He encounters his dead buddy's sister and helps her run her ranch. Then she finds out about his past.
 
Director: Robert N. Bradbury 
Writers: Robert N. Bradbury 
Stars: John Wayne, Lucile Browne, LeRoy Mason 
Genres: Action, Adventure, Drama, Western

metadata.Plot: Sheriff John Higgins quits and goes into prospecting after he thinks he has killed his best friend in shooting it out with robbers. He encounters his dead buddy's daughter, who has come from back east, and helps her run her ranch. Then she finds out about his past.
metadata.Actors: John Wayne, Lucile Browne, LeRoy Mason
